Key Match Events: Wanindu Hasaranga took 2 wickets in his first 2 overs
Jeffrey Vandersay trapped Shai Hope lbw
Pre-Game Insights: Pathum Nissanka, the leading run scorer in ODIs in 2024, was ruled out due to a thigh strain
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka came from behind to win the T20 series 2-1 last week
Sri Lanka are ranked seventh in the ICC ODI rankings, versus the West Indies at 10th
Others: The remaining two matches of the series will be held on Wednesday and Saturday
